params.capital: amount of capital to estimate with, denominated in USDC
params.gfi: amount of GFI to estimate with

params.addr: the address to check claimable rewards for

returns._0: how many rewards could be claimed by a call to `collectRewards`
how many rewards were collected and sent to caller

params.deposit: struct describing all the assets to deposit

returns.result: ids all of the ids of the created depoits, in the same order as deposit. If GFI is  present, it will be the first id.

params.capital: the change in gfi holdings, denominated in USDC
params.gfi: the change in gfi holdings, denominated in GFI

returns.score: resulting score for the member given the GFI and capital changes

params.epoch: epoch to estimate the rewards of

params.capitalPositionIds: id of the capital position to harvest the underlying asset of

memberScoreOf(address).details: if eligibleScore == totalScore then there are no changes between now and the next epoch

returns.totalScore: the total score that will be eligible next epoch

onERC721Received(address,address,uint256.details: Whenever an {IERC721} `tokenId` token is transferred to this contract via {IERC721-safeTransferFrom} by `operator` from `from`, this function is called. It must return its Solidity selector to confirm the token transfer. If any other value is returned or the interface is not implemented by the recipient, the transfer will be reverted. The selector can be obtained in Solidity with `IERC721.onERC721Received.selector`.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

returns.eligibleAmount: how much USDC of capital is currently eligible for rewards
returns.totalAmount: how much  USDC of capital is currently eligible for rewards

returns.eligibleAmount: how much GFI is currently eligible for rewards
returns.totalAmount: how much GFI is currently eligible for rewards

returns.eligibleTotal: sum of all member scores that are currently eligible
returns.nextEpochTotal: sum of all member scores that will be eligible next epoch

params.addr: the address to check the voting power of

params.withdrawal: all of the GFI and Capital ids to withdraw

CannotOperateOnUnownedAsset(address).notice: Thrown when operating on an unowned asset

RequiresValidInput().notice: Thrown when calling a method with invalid input

UnsupportedAssetAddress(address).notice: Thrown when anything is called with an unsupported asset

calculateMemberScore(uint256,uint256).notice: Calculate what the Membership Score would be if a `gfi` amount of GFI and `capital` amount  of Capital denominated in USDC were deposited.

claimableRewards(address).notice: Check how many rewards are claimable at this moment in time for caller.

collectRewards().notice: Collect all membership rewards for the caller.

deposit((uint256,(address,uint256)[])).notice: Deposit multiple assets defined in `multiDeposit`. Assets can include GFI, Staked Fidu,  and others.

estimateMemberScore(address,int256,int25.notice: Estimate the score for an existing member, given some changes in GFI and capital

estimateRewardsFor(uint256).notice: Estimate rewards for a given epoch. For epochs at or before lastFinalizedEpoch  this will be the fixed, accurate reward for the epoch. For the current and other  non-finalized epochs, this will be the value as if the epoch were finalized in that  moment.

finalizeEpochs().notice: Finalize all unfinalized epochs. Causes the reserve splitter to distribute  if there are unfinalized epochs so all possible rewards are distributed.

harvest(uint256[]).notice: Harvest the rewards, interest, redeemable principal, or other assets  associated with the underlying capital asset. For example, if given a PoolToken,  this will collect the GFI rewards (if available), redeemable interest, and  redeemable principal, and send that to the owner of the capital position.

totalCapitalHeldBy(address).notice: Get all capital, denominated in USDC, in Membership held by `addr`. This returns the current  eligible amount and the total USDC value of capital.

totalGFIHeldBy(address).notice: Get all GFI in Membership held by `addr`. This returns the current eligible amount and the  total amount of GFI.

totalMemberScores().notice: Get the sum of all member scores that are currently eligible and that will be eligible next epoch

votingPower(address).notice: Check the voting power of a given address

withdraw(((uint256,uint256)[],uint256[]).notice: Withdraw multiple assets defined in `multiWithdraw`. Assets can be GFI or capital  positions ids. Caller must have been permitted to act upon all of the positions.

userdoc.notice: Externally facing gateway to all Goldfinch membership functionality.
